item.title: Curious
item.dc:creator: @sinisoul sini
item.description:
@sinisoul wrote:

It’d be good to have a global instance of the server so you could modify its state, and the only case I see doing that is when you want it to shut down. Passing around an instance of the server to separate modules would be a pain. I’d have a context object for accessing its fields and having specific helper methods though.

// Something goes wrong
Server.getInstance().shutdown();
return;                                        //Assum
ServerContext

initialize(object, object1, object2)
setFields(object, object1, object2)
end

helperMethod1()
end

helperMethod2()
end
end
